code.description: Error code for programmatic error handling

requestId.description: Unique request identifier for tracking and debugging

errors.description: Array of field-specific validation errors (only present for validation errors)

field.description: Field name that caused the error

startTime.description: Workflow start time in ISO 8601 format

closeTime.description: Workflow close time in ISO 8601 format (null if still running)

executionTime.description: Workflow execution time in milliseconds (null if still running)

historyLength.description: Number of events in workflow history

result.description: Workflow result (only present if workflow is completed)

error.description: Workflow error (only present if workflow failed)
